question: With reference to medieval Indian rulers, which one of the following statements is correct?
option1: Alauddin Khalji first set up a separate ariz’s department
option2: Balban introduced the branding system of horses of military
option3: Muhammad bin Tughlaq was succeeded by his uncle to the Delhi throne
option4: Firuz Tughlaq set up a separate department of slaves
answer: Firuz Tughlaq set up a separate department of slaves
explanation: Firoz Tughlaq set up a separate department of slaves known as ‘Diwan-i-Bandagan’. Mohd Bin Tughlaq was succeeded by his cousin (not uncle) Firoz Tughlaq. Alauddin Khalji introduced the branding system of horses in his military.
